items.title: services_provided
items.value: Cadila Global LLC offers staffing and recruitment services to businesses and job seekers.

items.title: accuracy_of_information
items.value: Users must ensure that all information provided is accurate and truthful.

items.title: modifications
items.value: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, with changes taking effect immediately upon posting.

items.title: data_collection
items.value: We collect personal information necessary for providing our services.

items.title: data_usage
items.value: Collected data is used in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

items.title: data_protection
items.value: We implement measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access.

items.title: consent_for_sms_communication
items.value: The information (Phone Numbers) obtained as part of the SMS consent process will not be shared with third parties for marketing purposes.

items.title: types_of_sms_communications
items.value: If you have consented to receive text messages from Cadila Global LLC, you may receive messages related to the following: Conversations external.

items.title: message_frequency
items.value: Message frequency may vary depending on the type of communications. For example, you will be receiving between 300 to 400 SMS messages related to follow-up after the calls.

items.title: potential_fees_for_sms_messaging
items.value: Please note that standard message and data rates may apply, depending on your carrierâ€™s pricing plan. These fees may vary if the message is sent domestically or internationally.

items.title: opt_in_method
items.value: You may opt-in to receive SMS messages from Cadila Global LLC in the following way: By submitting an online form.

items.title: opt_out_method
items.value: You can opt out of receiving SMS messages at any time. To do so, simply reply 'STOP' to any SMS message you receive or contact us directly to request removal.

items.title: help
items.value: If you are experiencing any issues, you can reply with the keyword HELP or contact us at (832) 757-9277.

items.title: additional_options
items.value: If you do not wish to receive SMS messages, you can choose not to check the SMS consent box on our forms.

items.title: standard_messaging_disclosures
items.value: Message and data rates may apply. You can opt out at any time by texting 'STOP'. For assistance, text 'HELP' or visit our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions pages. Message frequency may vary.

items.title: customers_and_guests
items.value: Updates about orders, deliveries, or other relevant service-related information.

items.title: job_applicants
items.value: Information regarding application status, onboarding materials, or other employment-related updates.

items.title: licensing
items.value: Cadila Global LLC operates in compliance with all applicable licensing requirements in Texas.

items.title: employment_classification
items.value: We classify our workers in accordance with federal and state laws to ensure proper wages, benefits, and protections.

items.title: non_discrimination
items.value: We adhere to non-discrimination policies, ensuring equal opportunity for all candidates and employees.

items.title: job_descriptions
items.value: Clients must provide accurate job descriptions, qualifications, and requirements for positions to be filled.

items.title: work_environment
items.value: Clients are responsible for maintaining a safe and compliant work environment for assigned employees.

items.title: service_interruptions
items.value: Cadila Global LLC is not liable for any damages resulting from service interruptions, technical issues, or unforeseen events.

items.title: employment_decisions
items.value: We are not responsible for employment decisions made by clients or candidates.

items.title: jurisdiction
items.value: These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Texas. Any disputes arising shall be resolved in the courts of Texas.
